mission.text2: We are here <blue>to provide expertise, technologies, service and products in microelectronics</blue> for partners in a Vietnamese market and way beyond

icDesign.title: IC Design
icDesign.content: Sirius Semiconductors IC design team consists of world-class engineers with a proven track record of delivering complex ICs for a variety of applications. We have a wide range of expertise in analog, digital and mixed-signal design. We also have an experience of working with a variety of technologies from 180nm to 28nm.

software.title: Software Development
software.content: We provide a full cycle of software development from scratch to a market-ready solution. Our team consists of experienced engineers with a wide range of expertise in different technologies and platforms. We have a strong background in embedded software development, but we are not limited to it. We also have experience in web and mobile development, as well as in creating complex cloud solutions.
